name: Patrol Road Battle
description:
Patrol Road Battle is amazing brain games to explore your skills to explore the city and banish all enemies cars villain. You should destroy all villain car is front of you! your patrol vehicle can use gun cannon, nitros speed and other power!

After you reach as far as you go ad earn coin as much as you collect, you should open new patrol car that have more power!

Feature
# Lot of amazing patrol cars
# Amazing world to explore
# Lot of weapon and pwer up
# Very good graphic
# Easy to play
